p: The NO scavenging activity of different plant extracts was determined by using Griess reagent. Sodium nitroprusside was used as nitric oxide-producing agent. The root and stem of M. rubicaulis and leaves of R. indica had shown NO scavenging activity at higher concentrations (100 µg/ml), i.e., 31% and 21% and 22%, respectively. The root, stem, and leaves extracts of M. rubicaulis had shown IC 50 value as slightly higher than that of standard drug curcumin as 0.23 µg/ml, 0.32 µg/ml, and 0.58 µg/ml, respectively. Similarly, the extract of R. indica had also exhibited higher IC 50 value to that of standard, which is shown in Figure 2 and Table 2.
